website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Court Vision Mid is a combination of classic style and modern updates. This addition to the growing collection of Nike Court shoes is an excellent alternative to the AF1 Mid. Completing a fashionable OOTD is not a problem, for it carries a leather upper with a retro look and oozing versatility. Level up your style with this retro sneaker that is up for grabs at an affordable rate.
pros: The Nike Court Vision Mid provides comfort on feet, according to several reviews
Many customers say that it has a fashionable design that looks like the Nike Air Force Ones
It is among Nike sneakers that has a versatile style that can complete a variety of casual outfits, according to some users
Several purchasers say that they appreciate the multiple colorways that this sneaker is available in
The Nike Court Vision Mid is available at an affordable price
cons: A couple of reviewers have stated that this kick fits a bit narrow
The leather upper is stiff, as per a few wearers

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't satisfied with my purchase.i thought I was paying for authentic nike sneakers.these sneakers are bootleg.this was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Bad boxing
customer_reviews.text: Box was in bad condition but at lease the shoes are good.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Aware Middle schooler approved!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them! He's in middle school & gets best dressed often. My little fashion guy. Lucked up & found these much cheaper than the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Lacier Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: they will be your normal us fit. Love court visions something about them

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Received my package a few minutes ago and the box was broken and damaged and held together with a rubber band in the middle. Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Chandinie

customer_reviews.title: Very tough and hard
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like them because they crushed my toes and were very to get on my feet

customer_reviews.title: on Time
customer_reviews.text: Just the way I pictured it, and in a Very timely manner

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected not in good condition too dirty

customer_reviews.title: Sensor shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very nice. How the hell you leave the sensor on the shoe?

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson , he really liked them so grandmas happy!

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box but shoes ok
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it is what I ordered but this box is all jacked up. Product not affected just jeeze...

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoy them my husband say they fit well

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: They dont look ugly at all,but looks a little ship quality

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes. But box is wrecked and had big rubber band around it. I’m the type to keep box. But not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas loomis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were in perfect condition. The she box it came in was the original box and was in perfect condition. Overall A+ worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my boyfriend’s birthday. I was so excited! I knew he would love them. What I got was not what I ordered. I was afraid this would happen after looking at some of the reviews. I ordered the black and white pair in a size 13 men’s. What I received was an all black Nike combat boot in a kids size. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Littlesmith’s

customer_reviews.title: Security device left on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Item had security device on one shoe which was very hard to remove.. the box was extremely beat up package looked like it’s been kicked picked up and kicked again..
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my fiance
customer_reviews.text: The box that the shoes came in was pretty badly damaged which is why I took away a star cuz it was supposed to be a Christmas gift and I hate having to give it to the person in a banged up box but the shoes look very good and don't look used or in back condition so I'll be keeping them
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Brown stain on all white shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brand new white shoes unfortunately arrived with brown stain that cannot be easily removed, dissapointed as purchased this product as a present for my lil bro
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Court Vision Mid Basketball Shoes
feature_bullets: Leather, faux leather and rubber design inspired by mid-80's basketball shoes.
Embossed swoosh design and logo details on the top add style and visual interest.
Rubber midsole provides durability and traction.
The leather and synthetic leather upper is durable.
